title: Enzo Flashfire: The Birth Of Spyridon Five
description: Enzo Flashfire, the greatest ever BMX rider returns from the grave. His reason, to form a new BMX superhero bully fighting force called 'The Spyridon Five'. He recruits four friends from Cornerpoint, wannabe BMX champions. Together they must rid the world of 'bullies'. Skullclaw, the enemy, and chief of the 'bullies' is brainwashing children across the globe, turning them into 'bullies'. A ghostly BMX thrill ride, and the first in the series of 'The Spyridon Five' books. Read the book and be part of the world of 'Spyridon'. For illustrations, details of future books, take a look at www.thespyridonfive.com or www.wolfhawkwriting.com.
author: David Jacks
